sentence: Also the hotel will need remodeling soon
The maintenance staff had to change the breaker to fix the problem
The hotel was nice but could use some upgrading especially in the rooms my sink was cracked the bathroom vanity was cracked etc
The room mostly the bathroom could use a little updating but the service all around more than makes up for it
Some of the wooden floors could be redone
rooms need a little updating
I stayed there for only two nights and during this time they were renovating which resulted in jack hammering on off one day
room floor was not renovated yet

The hotel was renovating so we endured the constant banging for the duration of our stay but when we realized the water was turned off one day my wife called to the front desk to see how long it would be off for

She was told that we should have known the water would be off from the website we read about the renovations and nothing about lack of water and the signs in the lobby we searched again for signs not there
Although I was given one of the updated rooms which was nice the overall service level made me feel like I was in a Motel 6
Wonderful stay at the recently renovated Omni Shoreham
So nice room but the amenities around the hotel need a major redo
I really appreciated little updates like a lighted makeup mirror
Our view was amazing though the housekeeping and maintenance is great the front desk helpful and polite and the location is perfect to explore the city centre on foot or with short cab rides
We look forward to seeing the same friendly faces each year and sharing any updates we have with our extended families
Hotel has been updated and close to the State Capitol and many restaurants within walking distance
The rooms were updated and beautifully maintained
The hotel rooms look recently renovated
The free drinks for Omni members was nice the Starbucks in the lobby was being remodeled so we used the Starbucks stand in the atrium
